subject: Cricket
lead_paragraph: Sachin Tendulkar became the first player to reach 15,000 runs in one-day internationals while steering India to a six-wicket victory yesterday against South Africa in the Future Cup in Belfast, Northern Ireland. The 34-year-old Tendulkar scored 93 to help India reach its target of 227 with five balls to spare and level the three-match series, 1-1.
